org.opencastproject.assetmanager.api.Value.ValueType

Packages that use Value.ValueType
Package
Description
org.opencastproject.assetmanager.api
This package and all of its sub-packages contain the API definition of the asset manager.
org.opencastproject.assetmanager.api.query
Implementations are required to be immutable.
org.opencastproject.assetmanager.impl
This package and all of its sub-packages contain the default implementation of the asset manager API as defined in org.opencastproject.assetmanager.api.
org.opencastproject.assetmanager.impl.query
Default query implementation.
